Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires manufacturers of synthetic braiding hair, weaves, and extensions to disclose all ingredients used in the manufacturing of such products
Summary: Requires manufacturers of synthetic braiding hair, weaves, and extensions to disclose all ingredients used in the manufacturing of such products and identify by label which products contain carcinogens and/or reproductive toxicants.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring manufacturers of synthetic braiding hair, weaves, and extensions to disclose all ingredients used in the manufacturing of such products
